entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 08:10 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
